Pre-Game Insights: The Three Lions will face Greece in their third fixture of the UEFA Nations League on 10 October 2024.
Lee Carsley is the new head coach for the Three Lions.
It will be the second England game at Wembley in the 2024 competition, so a massive attendance is expected in support of Lee Carsley's men.
Others: Ticket prices for England vs Greece vary depending on the seating category and age.
The highest price in the general category is £80, while the cheapest seat is £35.
The prices for adults and children aged 16 and below in the family encloser are £25 and £12.50, respectively.
Students, OAPSs and U16s are eligible for a £10 discount.
There are only a limited number of England vs Greece tickets in the level two category, with prices ranging between £95 and £120.
Members of the England Supporters Travel Club and My England Football pay a special price of £25 for the clash with Greece.
Travel club members who have booked seats in Wembley's other areas ahead of this clash with Greece will receive £5 off for seniors and £2.50 for juniors.
The first phase of ticket sales for this match began on 13 August 2024 and will conclude on 21 August, targeting the England Supporters Travel Club.
The second phase of the sales for England vs Greece tickets will commence on 22 August and run through to 27 August 2024, targeting My England Football Club members.
The general public sale for tickets to England vs Greece is scheduled for 28th August 2024, starting at noon.
Greece supporters travelling to England to watch this clash with the Three Lions on 10 October 2024 can visit the official Wembley site for directions on how to book seats.
Hospitality tickets for England vs Greece will give you a great view of the pitch, access to VIP lounges and an executive dining experience.
Hospitality pricing for England vs Greece tickets varies depending on your seating location and the services provided.
Hospitality packages include Inner Circle (£2,640), Center Circle (£5,046), Booby Moore (£9,030), One Twenty (£13,002), and Number Nine (£6,342).
Private box hospitality packages are fully booked.
England vs Greece tickets will be dispatched within the last week before England hosts Greece at Wembley on 10 October 2024.
Disabled persons who wish to make reservations for England vs Greece should contact Wembley Stadium using the number available on the official stadium website.
Wembley Stadium is most conveniently accessed via public transport, including train, bus, tube, rail, or pedestrian routes.
Wembley Stadium is served by three stations: Wembley Park Station, Wembley Stadium Station, and National Express.
If driving to Wembley on October 10, 2024, please use the stadium parking lot and reserve your parking space via wembleyofficialparking.com.
Brent Council will fine illegally parked vehicles on matchday and, in the worst-case scenario, tow them away.
